text: Sera Tikotikovatu is an actress from Fiji. She starred as Kirra in Pirate Islands: The Lost Treasure of Fiji. She is currently living in Fiji, and works and studies there. Tikotikovatu hails from Dravuni, Kadavu. She also chaperoned Miss Nasinu to the Miss Fiji Pageant 2019 ==2010 Vodafone Fiji Hibiscus Festival== Tikotikovatu was a contestant in the Vodafone Fiji Hibiscus Festival, 2010. She was sponsored by the Suva City Council.http://www.hibiscusfiji.com/ She was crowned the Vodafone Miss Fiji Hibiscus 2010 Queen.http://www.fijitimes.com.fj/story.aspx?id=154733 ==2010 South Pacific Pageant== Tikotikovatu represented Fiji to the South Pacific Pageant held in Papua New Guinea. She was third runner up in the competition. ==Filmography== {|class=wikitable |- !Series !!Year !!Role |- |Pirate Islands: The Lost Treasure of Fiji ||2007 ||Kirra |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Fijian film actresses Category:1987 births Category:People from Dravuni
title: Sera Tikotikovatu
